attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: sir 12 signal brigade made up of 3 ta regiments 33 in liverpool and manchester 34  sig regt in the northeast and 35 in the midlands all have members that have served the goverment in iraq and afganistan yet there service means nothing to you  a lot of good people will just fall a part without the family of the regiments were thay serve  i served in iraq for this country  now thay let me down

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "save 33 34 35 signal regiments."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20492


Prime Minister's Office
